alert.note: Alert for Door; Kewaunee; Manitowoc (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued September 04 at 8:23PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ADVISORY ISSUED FOR LAKE MICHIGAN SHORELINE WISCONSIN... The Wisconsin Department of Natural Resources has issued an Air Quality Advisory for Ozone that is in effect until 11:00 PM CDT today. This advisory affects people living in the following counties: Door, Kewaunee, and Manitowoc. Due to a persistent combination of hot temperatures, clear skies, and southerly winds, the air quality index is expected to reach the UNHEALTHY FOR SENSITIVE GROUPS level. People with lung disease (such as asthma), children, older adults, and people who are active outdoors (including outdoor workers) should reduce prolonged or heavy outdoor exertion. For more information on current air quality, please see: https://airquality.wi.gov
